house.UNKNOWN_OBJECT_TYPE:
([<creepy.player_q2class object at 0x02ADA6B0>, <creepy.something_q2class object at 0x02ADAD70>, <creepy.tip_q2class object at 0x02ADAD90>, <creepy.room_q2class object at 0x02ADADD0>], (<type 'exceptions.Exception'>, UnicodeEncodeError('ascii', u'
DARKNESS
I can’t tell if my eyes are open or not. I rub my face and squint harder to see. Eventually objects
emerge from the darkness and begin to take familiar forms. As my eyes adjust my attention is suddenly directed
to a subtle yet foul odor in the room. Behind me is the only form of light in the room. The dim light cuts a
distinguishable perimeter of what must be another door. Thinking to myself, I quickly reason that another door
could mean a possibility of freedom…
 ', 15, 16, 'ordinal not in range(128)')))

room.name: unknown room
room.desc: <The room is dark, musky, and cold.>
room.l: I inspected the room. It was a challenge to make my way around the room in such total darkness. I discovered what appears to be a desk, and the door that glows with salvation.
room.t: How do you think you're going to take a room along with you? No.
room.g: Sorry, you can't go anywhere. Currently, you are trapped in this cursed room.

item.l: The desk is aged and brittle. If you decide to open it, be careful while touching it. You may try to open the desk drawers to see what you can find... If you dare.
item.o: You hesitated, but eventually opened the drawers slowly as they squeaked.
item.t: You wrap your arms around the desk and try to pick it up, and then you notice that it has disgusting mildew buildup all over. You let go and decide to go on without taking the desk. However, you were able move it slightly.
item.g: You start heading back to where you saw the old desk.

item.l: The journal is old, falling apart, and covered in dust. Maybe it's important.
item.o: When you open the journal, pages crinkle and look like they are going to find out.

item.l: You look at the filthy bed trying not to be sick.
item.o: The bed is covered in filth. Do not open it.
item.t: This disgusting bed is not worth taking along.
item.g: You slowly walk over to the bed.

item.l: 'I feel sorry for anyone who has to lay their head on this pillow.'
item.o: You rip open the pillow and feathers fly everywhere getting stuck to everything damp. But within the dirty pile of feathers, you see something shining through. What could it be?
item.t: You grab the pillow. Maybe it will be of some use later.
item.g: You go back to where you found the pillow.

item.l: 'I have never seen anything like this before. I wonder what it could be used for.'
item.o: You twist the prism every which way, but you cannot get it to open. Then, you find a small hole on one of the sides. Maybe there's a key or special device that will open it.
item.t: 'I'd better hold onto this in case I need it later.'
item.g: You go to where the prism is.

item.l: 'I keep the key to my chest under here when I'm not holding it.'
item.t: You try to take the mattress off the bed, but fail miserably. You ripped it open!
item.o: Under the mattress you find an key.
item.g: You make your way back to where you found the grungy mattress

item.l: 'I don't know what it opens, but at least it opens something.'
item.t: You hold on to the key hoping it will be valuable.
item.g: You go to where you found the key.

item.l: The chest contains your most precious things.
item.o: Hmm... I wonder what could be in the chest
item.t: The chest is too heavy to carry.

item.l: You look at the photo album, and blow off the dust build-up. Underneath all the dust, you see a beautiful leather cover with gold engravings.
item.o: You open the photo album and see old fashioned pictures of people you've never seen before.

requirement.prereq: <In order to interact with this, you must gain access to the chest by finding the key.>

item.l: You may need your flashlight to fend off monsters that live in darkness.
item.o: You open the flashlight to find two batteries and some wiring inside. They're dead of course.
item.t: Maybe the broken remains will come in handy.
item.g: You go back to where you found the broken flashlight.

item.o: You open the battery and nickel metal hydrate acid spills all over your hands.
item.t: You hesitantly decide to take the battery.
item.g: You go back to where you found the battery.

requirement.prereq: <You desperately wiggle the knob, but the door does not open. You must find the item(s) needed to open>

item.l: I think this is probably the way out of the room. The light shining through allows me to see the shape of other objects around.
The dusty book is written in a foreign language and illegible to you. However, there are very interesting pictures and diagrams.
item.t: You take the book just in case it proves to be useful.
item.g: You go to where you found the dusty book.

item.l: You suspiciously look at the secret door. It could be a trap. On the other hand, it could lead to answers.
